title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.18 - Reporting requirements for participating colleges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.18 - Reporting requirements for participating colleges

State Regulations
(a) Whenever a school determines a student
has dropped to less than half-time attendance, the school must report such
information to the National Student Loan Clearinghouse. A school that does not
use the Clearinghouse shall report in a manner that has been approved by the
corporation. (b) Whenever a college
receives information which would make the borrower or cosigner ineligible to
receive program loans due to a default or failure as described in section
2213.2
(f) of this

Part, the college must report such information to the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2213.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
